sub_title: Helping organizations navigate & automate their Value Chain Verification journey | Forest Engineer 🌱🌲
summary:
Sales professional with broad experience working in various countries and industries . Enjoy connecting business value with technology in order to drive commercial – and stakeholder results.
Throughout my life, I have developed a passion for the environment and sustainable development. I enjoy helping companies achieve their sustainability goals.
Experience working in account management, pipeline and business generation. Gets energy from challenges in a dynamic landscape and teamwork. 
#saas #sustainability #b2b #scope3 #valuechain #netzero

Nederlandse cursussen (beginners, halfgevorderd and gevorderd intensief). TU Delft, Nederland.

profile_positions.description:
- Business generation, bringing new logos and establishing value proposition in the market of BENELUX.
- Bringing value to companies from 200 FTE to Enterprise level ( >1000 FTE)
- Responsible for driving the full sales cycle: from prospecting to negotiation and closing the sale.
- Developing a solid closing plan.
- Deep understanding of the Software/product and customer user cases.
- Identifying and developing the company’s unique selling propositions and differentiators. 
- Ensuring relevant stakeholder management.
- Main tools used: Sales force, Sales Loft, Sales Navigator.
- Remote video demonstrations & negotitation.
- B2B & SaaS sales.

Skills: · Communication · (SaaS) Software as a Service · Sales Prospecting · Negotiation · Platform Sales · Sales Process · Solution Selling

profile_positions.title: Account Executive

profile_positions.description:
Account Management: focus on strengthen and deepen client relationships and monitoring volume targets.
•  Sales Coordination for wood pulp between Sales staff in The Netherlands, European customers, the Sales Operational staff in Chile, finance departments in Chile and Europe, and the European ports.
•  Receive and process customer requirements and assisting in complains.
•  Prepare and input sales orders into the system, issue and send documents to customers and port operators.
•  Reports (credit, overdue, commissions, rebate, and sales report)
•  Inventory check and management in SAP
•  Advanced use of CRM and SAP systems.

Responsible for FSC and PEFC of Arauco Europe office. 
•  Organize annual PEFC and FSC inspection audits with SGS Nederland for certification, including: 
•  Training to company staff into valid company FSC and PEFC CoC procedures.
•  Keeping all data regarding forest certification (PEFC and FSC) up to date. 
•  Control of credit stocks to conduct forestry certification audits.

 Skills: Account Management · Audit Coordination · International Sales
profile_positions.title: Sales Executive &  Sustainability Audit Specialist

profile_positions.description:
•  Statistical assessment about the variables that have an influence over the quality of the fruit.
•  Implementation of a traceability system together with customers.
•  Agricultural knowledge about the quality of fruit & agricultural market in Europe.
•  Specialization in "Exoten" P16 (AQS Agro Quality support Nederland B.V). 
•  Reporting to the commercial area the quality of the products.
•  Use of Navision 

Skills: Statistical analysis · Quality control ·  Exoten specialist
profile_positions.title: Quality Control & Analysis

profile_positions.description:
•  Involved in the complete Sales Cycle.
• Analyze prospects and prioritize targets in different industries (focus on consumer products and pharmaceutical areas). 
•  Creating database of prospects: Daily internet research. 
•  Defining ideal customer profile and creating approach strategies.
•  Leading demand generation strategies: Digital tools and networking events.
•  Acquiring new clients: Visiting and calling prospects. 
•  Working with sales forecast methodology. Weekly presentation to the sales team.
•  Developing opportunities with a solid close plan, in order to achieve monthly goals.
•  Attending commercial activities (visiting fairs).
•  Growing and developing customer accounts: Fulfilling their requirements as a business partner. 
•  Proactive learning about current and new products.
•  Receiving customers' requests and making the quotation of projects. 
•  Working hand in hand with the engineering department to achieve customers' needs. 
•  Coordination with other departments: acquisition of raw materials, assembling and installing. 
•  Managing projects for their successful completion. 
•  Assisting the client in case of complaints. 
•  Purchasing and selling pharmaceutical and wine machines. 
•  Specific Knowledge: Specialization in pharmaceutical and food industry requirements. 
•  SAP software and CRM.

Skills: Sales prospecting · Food and beverage industry · Pharmacy industry · Communication · Project coordinator  ·  Negotitation

company.name: Sustainability Department - Municipality of La Pintana

profile_positions.company: Sustainability Department - Municipality of La Pintana
profile_positions.description:
The thesis was focused on the study of the survival of four different tree species in the Municipality of La Pintana, one of the poorest districts in Santiago.
•  Statistically assessment of the variables that determine the plant mortality in the area using chi-square method.
•  To give the Municipality efficient methods, tools, and ideas for improvement of the tree survival.
•  Development of urban forestry guidelines for future efficient use of forest resources
profile_positions.title: Statistical Analysis of Sustainable Urban Forestry

profile_positions.description: The work consisted in building an electronic library, gathering information regarding urban trees in Chile and in countries worldwide. The library is for the use of the National Forestry Corporation.  Santiago, Chile.
profile_positions.title: Urban Forestry Project
